title: Elisha’s Miracles of Provision and Healing
summary: Elisha performs multiple miracles: multiplying oil for a widow, raising a Shunammite woman’s son from the dead, purifying poisoned stew, and feeding a hundred men with a few loaves. These acts show God’s care and Elisha’s growing prophetic authority.

faq.question: What miracle did Elisha do for the widow?
faq.answer: He caused her small amount of oil to fill many jars, allowing her to pay off her debt.

faq.question: How did Elisha raise the Shunammite woman’s son?
faq.answer: He stretched out over the boy and prayed, and God brought him back to life.
